Blog.post: Dude, My favorite tv show got canceled! Im so upset. I was so into that show and out of no where ryan comes out saying that it iwll not be back for another season. I couldn't believe my ears. I was so angry. Its not fair. But luckily enough One of the girls on a site im on created a petition. go sign it. Its : urlLink http://www.petitiononline.com/out17/petition.html Go check it out and help save On air!
hi everyone! My name is Jessica. and im the bomb! hahah, just playing

I didn't get to see Ryan Cabrera...... I tried to convince my mom, but she had "plans" to hang out with her sister...even though she made the plans after i had already told her, that i wanted to go to the concert. Oh well, what can i do.... its too late now. Ryan did 3 concerts down here already and i missed all 3 thnx to my mom. NO Ryan .C. NO Ryan .S. My summer bites the wang......

wow when i went to see the red sox, i had a blast! i met manny (took pix wit him) and i shook pedros hand! i got to see the game form bleacher seats, but it was awesome. we won and it was great. when i was on the field and they called my name, my name got put on the big screen. it was so much fun. i had a great time! and the whoel time, i didnt even know, but David Ortiz was behind me the whole time!

hey, today i going to go see the Red Sox! i won this award called the latino youth recorgnition and they gave me 6 tickets to go see the game, and i get to go on the field and meet some of the players! i am so excited. its so cool! Im going to try to get autographs for so many people.
Im trying to hard, to convince my mom to take me to go see Ryan Cabrera. Hes a great performer, and i want to go so bad! I have my fingers crossed!

Man, i was listening to the radio this morning (that reminds me i just got my KIISFM102.7 ryan shirt) and Ryan was talking about shana(his gf) and he went and called her. he was talking about how he was going to make love to her later, i was getting so grossed out, but what can u do? i wish he was single again! I still cant get over the fact that his show got canceled! its not fair!

Hey everyone! its Aug.2. and im bored, I still can't believe Ryans show got Canceled. Anyways, does anyone know Who Ryan Cabrera is? well hes going to be in MA and i'm looking forward to seeing him if i can. So if theres any fans, go out and see him. he'll be at Square one mall on the 12th of August and at Emerald Square mall on The 13th of August! Check out another Ryan! =)
